rewrite3:
For the fifth paragraph, please make the following changes:

1. Center the text.
2. Switch the font to Arial.
3. Set the line spacing after the paragraph to zero.
4. Change the font size to 8 point.
5. Add a 1 cm space before the paragraph begins.
6. Indent the first line by 2 centimeters.
7. Adjust the line spacing to 1.5 lines.
8. Bolden the paragraph text.
9. Apply the hex color #FFFF00 to the font.
10. Set the paragraph to Outline Level 6.
